title: Black trimmed wizard robes

properties.name: description
properties.value: Black trimmed wizard robes are a black wizard robe set with a white trim. The pieces are possible rewards from easy Treasure Trails. This set has the same bonuses as their regular blue counterparts but is worn by players to show a form of wealth.

content:
A player wearing black wizard robes with trim.

Black trimmed wizard robes are a black wizard robe set with a white trim. The pieces are possible rewards from easy Treasure Trails. This set has the same bonuses as their regular blue counterparts but is worn by players to show a form of wealth.

This set was released on the 12th of June, 2014 along with the Treasure Trail Expansion update.

Components[edit | edit source]

Item GE Price
Black wizard hat (t) 175,651
Black wizard robe (t) 130,761
Black skirt (t) 15,989
Total 322,401
